reauth_confirm.description: The password for {username} is no longer valid.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate your MyQ Account

integration_removed.description:
The MyQ integration has been removed from Home Assistant.

MyQ has blocked all third-party integrations. Read about it [here]({blog}).

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) integration entries from your Home Assistant setup. [Click here to see your existing MyQ integration entries]({entries}).
integration_removed.title: The MyQ integration has been removed
